01000100001111101110000000100001110101111000101011110000001101101010111111001110111111101011111011101000001001001010100011101010001001011010100011011011010100100001011001011

01101001110111001110011010010101111001100100011000110000110011111110111110001011111011011101110011111001101010101000000110000100010011101001010110011001001101101101011110011

Check:
A * Inverse(A) (Should be all 1s) =
11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111

(A+B)*C =
00110111000111000110010001101101111000111100111111010110001101101011100010101001100010101000010101100010111100001010110001101110011110101110110011110100101100000011010000010
